alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 2:25PM EST until January 30 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Buffalo NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Allegheny River At Olean affecting Cattaraugus County. For the Allegheny River...including Olean...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Allegheny River at Olean. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood stage, flooding possible on Union Street in Allegany and East Riverside Drive 1 to 3 miles upstream of Olean. Some farm lands along the river are also impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:01 PM EST Sunday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 12.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.3 feet on 03/11/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 230 AM EST.
